name: Sliding Move The Flower Block Out Puzzle Games
name_original: Sliding Move The Flower Block Out Puzzle Games
description:
Join us on the The most challenging and addictive puzzle game in Flower style. You need to get the main block out of the enemy or obstacle block by moving the other block and make the way through.
Get the main block out in a minimum of move to get more score, also this game will help you boost your thinking skills and sharp your brain. You can use hints whenever you get stuck or need help. improve yourself anytime and see how far you can go.

Move Me out Features:
- 3 Unique Flower Heroes block Style ( Randomly for each stage ).
- More than 30,000+ challenging puzzles.
- Amazing HD Retina Graphics and effect in Flower style.
- Moves count to show your present.
- 10 Free Hints for guide your game
- Refresh button for start your game any time.
- Sound effects
